Vehicle.Name: Syliure-25 Hyperdrive Sled
Vehicle.Description:
[H3]Syliure-25 Hyperdrive Sled[h3]
Designed to add hyperspace capabilities to smaller ships without hyperdrives like starfighters and some patrol boats, TransGalMeg Industries Syliure-25 is one example of a number of similar sleds and hyperspace rings in use throughout the galaxy. Equipped with a class 2 hyperdrive and either an R1 or R2 astromech droid, the Sylurie-25 is good for five hyperspace jumps. It attaches to the starfighter (any starship with silhouette 3) and reduces its handling by 2 and speed by 1, but can be jettisoned and reattached in space. A Syliure-25 costs 10,000 credits.
Vehicle.Source: Edge of the Empire Core Rulebook
Vehicle.StarFighters: Gives jump capability to starfighters. Reduces handling by 2 and speed by 1.
